hooks.name: gk/gravitymigrate/upload/after-upload
hooks.description: Fires after a file is uploaded.

parameters.name: new_file_path
parameters.description: The path to the uploaded file.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for the uploaded file.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymigrate/cron/clear-export-interval
hooks.description: Filters the amount of time to wait before removing exported files from the server.

parameters.name: export_interval
parameters.description: The number of seconds to wait after an export before deleting generated files. Default 3 hours (in seconds).

hooks.name: gk/gravitymigrate/cron/clear-import-interval
hooks.description: Filters the amount of time to wait before removing imported files from the server.

parameters.name: import_interval
parameters.description: The number of seconds to wait after an import before deleting uploaded files. Default 1 hour (in seconds).

hooks.name: gk/gravitymigrate/export/batch-size
hooks.description: Filters the batch size of the export.

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.description: The batch size of the export. Default 10000.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymigrate/import/data_chunk_sizes
hooks.description: Filter the chunk sizes for migrating data types.

parameters.name: data_chunk_sizes
parameters.description: Array of data types and their chunk sizes.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymigrate/remote-request-args
hooks.description: Filters the arguments used for remote HEAD/GET requests to check source URL accessibility.
